name: py-linkedin-jobs-scraper
description: This is a simple example package. You can use [Github-flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/) to write your content.

scripts.clean: rm -fr build && rm -fr dist && rm -fr *.egg-info && rm -fr __pycache__ && rm -fr **/__pycache__ && rm -fr .pytest_cache
scripts.build: npm run clean && conda run -n linkedin-jobs-scraper python setup.py install_egg_info sdist bdist_wheel
scripts.deploy: conda run -n linkedin-jobs-scraper twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
